Hero.description: Specializing in operational automation for founders drowning in admin.

0.body: I was lucky to have worked with Gabriel on our project. He immediately took the lead and communicated with our team on a consistent basis providing updates and asking questions about the product we were building. He not only has a strong understanding of application development but also understood the business implications of the product we were building and took the time to educate himself on the audience we were building it for. His leadership was paramount in delivering our product on time and in scope.
0.author: Zach Hodder

Problem.headline: Your team is wasting 20 hours a week on Ctrl+C / Ctrl+V.
Problem.subheadline: Stop burning cash on manual data entry and repetitive tasks.

AboutMe.headline: The 'Hybrid' Developer
AboutMe.description: Business Background + Full Stack Skills. I don't just write code; I understand P&L, Operations, and Growth. I build systems that actually move the needle for your business.
